Reviews: Well, I came here not reading any of the reviews, which I regret. The food was mediocre or better said not worth it. The micheladas were a TOTAL disappointment. I was expecting better for the east side, so I hope they step it up. The service was not great either. The only positive thing is that the place is big, and they have loud music.
Relevant Content: *The food was mediocre or better said not worth it.
Replies: * Mediocre food quality * Food not worth the price

Reviews: Came in today for an early dinner. First time here. Ordered the breaded fish fillet platter and the molcajete de Mariacos. The presentation of their dishes and drinks are appetizing and look really delicious, however, for my taste it was a bit lacking. This is just my opinion, the food needed to be better seasoned and needed salt. The fish in the molcajete was a bit fishy tasting and the shrimp needed some salt. Maybe it's an off day for them, who knows, will give them another try in the future.
Relevant Content: *food needed to be better seasoned *needed salt *fish in the molcajete was a bit fishy tasting *shrimp needed some salt.
Replies: * Food needed more seasoning * Fish in the molcajete was fishy * Shrimp needed salt

Reviews: If I was able to give it zero stars I would. Food was all brought out for our party except one dish, waited another 25 minutes before getting the plate. Once we were done we received the check with a tip of 50% instead of 15%. We told the waitress and she said it was correct it was 15% and that's how the restaurant works. I then showed her what 15% was, her face dropped. Food is okay, service is horrible.

Reviews: Horrible service. Horrible food. Horrible atmosphere.   You've shoved all these tables in here yet you sit everyone in one god damn corner. You then take my order and prepare the pool table per my request however you take your time getting my food out, and then give the table away to other people. I ordered the fajitas which was as fresh as a microwaveable hungryman...  And I woulda preferred one of those. The waitress then never came back with the tortillas she said she'd bring (b/c how do you eat fijitas without tortillas?!). Never coming back.

No distance between tables (for covid) and one bucket for 40 dlls? Really??? No wayyy ! omg worst restaurant ever. Please don't go, take your money somewhere else

Summary: There are mixed reviews regarding the food quality at La Kbaña Del Tio Tavito. On one hand, some customers have praised the authentic Mexican cuisine and found the mariscos to be tasty. However, there are many negative reviews regarding the food quality as well. Some reviewers have mentioned that the food lacked taste and was bland, with overcooked chicken and flavorless asada. There were also complaints about the fish in the molcajete being fishy and the shrimp needing salt. One review even mentioned finding an insect in their rice and drink. There were criticisms of various dishes, such as burrito lacking beans, rice not being Mexican red rice, and the quesa birria having unappetizing cheese. Additionally, multiple reviews mentioned dry tacos and carne asada, and bad tasting oyster shots. Some reviewers had average quality food and poor quality fajitas. There were mixed reviews regarding food quality with some expressing overall satisfaction and others expressing overall dissatisfaction.
